entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Témiscamingue
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:04 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.3°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain this evening and ending before morning then clearing. Risk of thunderstorms this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
